Imagery Description: (a) Seated Dionysos, with drapery over left thigh, holding phiale and fillet in left hand, facing papposilen with thyrsus; right female mask (Type S) suspended above, (b) Bv, with two eggs and fillet, + A2r.
Additional Notes: Obverse finds a close parallel on no. 230 in the 'Altavilla Group'.
